name: Geometry No 1 – El Greco
description: This is the first image in a series of five digital artworks and is based on a detail from El Greco’s Holy Family (1595).  This series explore how well a set of random geometric coloured areas can represent an image. It also explores how well the same random geometric pattern can represent different images. Five artworks in this series are based on well-known paintings from masters. A random geometric pattern that was kept identical throughout the series was overlaid on the selected image and ea
